revision.text:
<!--인물_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Person
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원어이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망원인 | ontologyProperty = deathCause }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발견지 | ontologyProperty = bodyDiscovered }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 매장지 | ontologyProperty = restingPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 거주지 | ontologyProperty = residence }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 민족 | ontologyProperty = ethnicity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시민권 | ontologyProperty = citizenship }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 고향 | ontologyProperty = hometown }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학력 | ontologyProperty = education }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 직업 | ontologyProperty = occupation }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 활동기간 | startDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsStartYear | endDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsEndYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 봉급 | ontologyProperty = salary | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 순자산 | ontologyProperty = networth | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 몸무게 | ontologyProperty = weight | unit = Mass }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 칭호 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전임자 | ontologyProperty = predecessor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 후임자 | ontologyProperty = successor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 정당 | ontologyProperty = party }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 적수 | ontologyProperty = opponent }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위원 | ontologyProperty = board }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배우자 | ontologyProperty = spouse }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 동거인 | ontologyProperty = partner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자녀 | ontologyProperty = child }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 친척 | ontologyProperty = relative }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 상훈 | ontologyProperty = award }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부모 | ontologyProperty = parent }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 매장지좌표 =
| 경력       = 
| 소속       = 
| 현직       = 
| 전직       = 
| 작위       = 
| 칭호기간   = 
| 등단       = 
| 호출부호   = 
| 서명       = 
-->
